body: While cudaFree can sometimes block, cudaFree(0) doesn't block. In fact, it doesn't do anything but initialize the context and (unfortunately) has become the idiomatic way to do this: https://devtalk.nvidia.com/default/topic/911817/cudamalloc-is-too-expensive-and-gpu-memories/?offset=6
